Title: Revealing the truth about Tan Youming
Notes: Poster issued by the Propaganda Group of Tenth Design Institute 'The East Is Red' Combat Corps and the Revolutionary Rebellion Headquarters of the Fourth Machinery Department (四机部 第十设计院东方红战斗兵团 四机部机关革命造反总部 宣传组). 'Fourth Machinery Department' was the brief name for the Fourth Ministry of Machinery Industry of the People's Republic of China.Tan Youming (谭右铭), active Party member since 1933 and serving in the People's Liberation Army and its precursors since 1937, became Vice Minister of the Fourth Machinery Department in 1963.  On this poster he is accused of all kinds of decadent and counter-revolutionary behavior since his birth in an affluent family.
